alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lowndes; Thomas; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 22 at 5:01PM EST until January 22 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cook County in south central Georgia... Berrien County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Eastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... Eastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Tift County in south central Georgia... * Until 615 PM EST. * At 501 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Omega to 10 miles south of Thomasville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Quitman, Thomasville, Moultrie, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Boston, Enigma, Omega, Norman Park, Lenox, Alapaha, Pavo, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil and Ellenton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lowndes; Thomas; Tift
